meta.name: generator
meta.content: HTML Tidy for Linux/x86 (vers 7 December 2008), see www.w3.org

head.title: org.wso2.mashup.hostobjects.feed (WSO2 Mashup Server Host Objects API)

tr.td: The Entry host object is a generic host object capable of intelligently working with both Atom and RSS feeds.
The Feed host object is a generic host object capable of intelligently working with both Atom and RSS feeds.
The FeedReader is a generic reader of Atom and RSS feeds.
